data.message:
Tushar Bruhh to those who think he is being greedy, he just shared this post to help those children and the commnity who is trying to help those kids.
If he is sharing that, a lot of people are gonna donate and it would be a great help and it could be that he would have donated already.
And to help more he shared this to us.
He would never do such a stupid thing, he has a great fan following with huge respect and he is not slim shady anymore.
